title.en: Master Huo Fails To Pursue His Wife

altTitles.en: Master Huo Fails In Chasing His Wife

altTitles.zh-ro: Huò Shǎo Zhuī Qī Yòu Fānchēle

description.en: One day, she woke up, and 4 years later had passed. Not only did she become the contractual wife of the cold-faced tyrant Huo Yicheng, but she was also the human ATM for her stepmother and stepsister. Such injustice! After Shen Yunxi dealt with the other woman, she found out it was him who lied to her the most..

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界 屍山血河舞台 下総国 英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai: Shizan Ketsuga Butai, Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng III – Vũ Đài Núi Thây Sông Máu – Trận Chiến Thứ Bảy Ở Shimosha

description.en:
Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

description.en: Aoba, a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, ends up playing at the home of his classmate Mizutori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess"...?

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

altTitles.ja: タワーダンジョン

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower," a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons.
A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.

Tale of sword & sorcery and labyrinth exploration begins!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

title.en: Musume Janakute, Mama ga Suki Nano!?

altTitles.ja: 娘じゃなくて私が好きなの!?
娘じゃなくて私(ママ)が好きなの!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Musume Janakute, Watashi (Mama) ga Suki Nano!?
Musume Janakute, Watashi ga Suki Nano!?

altTitles.en: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!
You Like Me (Mama), Not My Daughter!?

altTitles.zh: 喜欢的不是女儿而是我吗？

altTitles.pt-br: Você Gosta É De Mim (Mamãe) E Não Da Minha Filha?!

altTitles.ja: ママ好き

description.en:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Animal Web)](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
description.pt-br: Esta é uma comédia romântica estrelada por uma mulher adulta de 30 anos chamada Ayako, que é confessada por um homem 10 anos mais novo dela, o estudante universitário de 20 anos, Takumi … Um homem que ela conhece como o menino "Ta-kun" que mora ao lado e que ensina sua filha adotiva desde os 10 anos. A revelação a espanta, pois ela pensava que sua filha Miu e ele eram um casal.

altTitles.ja: 甘井さんは冷たくて甘い

altTitles.vi: Amai-san lạnh lùng nhưng không kém phần ngọt ngào

description.en: Amai-san, the beautiful JK who lives next door, may seem cool, but in reality... only I know her sweet side?!
description.pt-br: Amai-san, a linda estudante que é minha vizinha, parece ser um pouco maneira, mas na realidade... apenas eu conheço o lado dócil dela?!

description.en: This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

altTitles.ja: 虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.

Note: This manga is based on the song 虚の記憶.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: Lim Chungah is a highschool student whose household got swindled by her own trusted uncle. With her parents leaving in pursuit of finding her uncle, she is temporarily left alone to live in her uncle's empty house. HOWEVER, what if Chungah's family weren't the only ones duped by her uncle's con? Enter Millenium Adventist Church, the biggest cult in their community and one of her uncle's scam victims. Lim Chungah finds herself cohabitating with Kim Yohan, the cult leader's one and only son. Oh God, will their living situation be okay?!
description.uk: Інтимне та небезпечне співмешкання з сином лідера культу почалось! Чону обманув її дядько, якому вона довіряла і її батьки пропали, коли сказали, що шукатимуть його, і раптом Чона живе одна в пустому будинку. Але обманули не тільки сім‘ю Чони! Найбільший культ в автономному районі «тисячолітня адвентистська церква» була теж обдурена її дядьком. І «Йохан», син лідера культу, прийшов до Чони додому. Він заносить свої речі…! Боже, що ж буде з цим співжиттям?
description.pt-br: Uma vida próxima e perigosa do filho do líder de um culto começou! Chungah foi enganada por seu tio em quem confiava e seus pais desapareceram, dizendo que estavam perseguindo seu tio desaparecido, e Chungah de repente vive sozinha em uma casa vazia. Mas não foi só a família de Chungah que foi enganada! O maior culto do distrito autônomo, "Igreja Adventista do Milênio", também foi enganado por seu tio. E "Yohan", o filho do líder do culto, veio à casa de Chung-ah. Ele está arrastando sua mala para dentro...! Deus, será que esta coabitação vai ficar bem?

title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/648136)
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: I Rely On Plug-Ins To Hunt Gods

altTitles.en: I Rely on Cheat to Hunt Gods

description.en: Main character Zhang Yi was betrayed by his best friend and lover, he was then reborn back to the day [Apocalypse] arrived. With his memories from his past life, Zhang Yi will challenge God at the opening. In order to gain the strength to defeat the people that betrayed him, Zhang Yi will use his knowledge to obtain a God-weapon, and begin to grow stronger and stronger, at the same time exploring the unknown secrets of the apocalyptic world…
description.zh: 主角张奕在上一世天启八年遭到兄弟和爱人的背叛而死，重生后回到了【天启】降临的那天。凭借着上一世的记忆，张奕在开局得到了亿里挑一的神级天赋。为了能够手刃背叛他的敌人，张奕利用天赋与从上一世带来的超级神器，在这一世开始追逐更为强大的强大，同时也开始探索关于天启世界那些不为人知的秘密……

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

altTitles.ja: 突風とビート

description.en: Nike, a mysterious high school girl living in a small town by the sea in Hokkaido, begins a mysterious journey to find her forgotten self when she meets Nemoto, a boy who rarely shows up for class.
description.ja: おばけが視える“ニケ”と“ネモ”。非日常浮遊感ラブコメディ！　霊が視える…高校1年生のニケにとってそれはずいぶん前から当たり前の日常。ある日プリントを届けるために最近学校に来ていない同級生・ネモの家を訪れると、そこはあまりにも元気な霊たちであふれていた…！

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. 

High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

altTitles.ja: アサシンズプライド

description.en: In the world where only the aristocrats have the power to fight the monster – mana. A youth named Kufa is dispatched as a tutor to find Mareida's talent, a nuisance girl born in a duke's family. If she is not talented, assassinate her. That, is the dark side of his task.
description.fr: Avec son identité fabriquée, Kuufa rencontre pour la première fois sa jeune élève sans talent, Melida. Il a désormais trois ans pour lui faire atteindre un niveau digne d'un Paladin, ou la faire disparaître si jamais elle ne montre pas de signe de progrès.
description.pt: No mundo onde apenas os aristocratas têm o poder de lutar contra o monstro "MANA", um jovem chamado Kufa é enviado como um tutor de Melida, uma garota sem talento nascida na família de um duque. Se ela realmente não for capaz de despertar seus poderes, Kufa tem uma missão: Assassiná-la!!!
description.ru: В этом мире только у аристократов есть сила чтобы противостоять монстрам – мана. Парню по имени Куфа было дано задание раскрыть талант Мериды, бездарной девушки, наследницы древнего рода Анжел. Если её способности так и не проявятся, Куфе приказано её убить. Такова тёмная сторона его задания…

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

title.en: Did My Biceps Turn You on?

altTitles.ja: 俺の上腕二頭筋、エッチな目で見てたでしょ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Jouwannitoukin, Ecchi namede Mitetadesho?

description.en: "It’s wet here. This isn’t just the pool water, is it?" Getting passionately caressed while hugged by the thick arms of a swimmer, I’m melting…!

Grand Duke of the North with black hair and heterochromia eyes (so you don’t have to choose over red or black eyes). Allegedly, he has 2 personality which switch on full moon rises, got a rabbit-like wife. That’s it. You know the rest.
description.pt-br: Estava possuída por um romance cujas palavras-chave eram trancamento e coerção. Além disso, este livro é fácil, sem motivo nem probabilidade de acontecimentos, muito menos amor. Felizmente para Yumi, que tinha medo da morte acima de tudo, ela era a personagem principal. Apesar de estar presa e atormentada dia e noite, não tenho que me preocupar em morrer. Mas, por alguma razão, o Grão-Duque do Norte não a prende nem a persegue. Só estava a observá-la. Ficou corado quando percebeu o homem corpulento e montanhoso que caminhava ao seu lado. “Talvez possamos nos dar bem?” ‘ Um pequeno sentimento de ansiedade brotou em um canto da mente de Barras, pois ela nem conseguia sonhar em saber o que ela estava pensando. A mulher era bonita e não havia razão para não fugir. Olhou para a cabeça da mulher e pensou. “Preciso parar com essa bobagem agora e prendê-la”.

altTitles.zh: 前女友成了我的顶头上司

altTitles.ja: プリニウス

description.en: It portrays the famous naturalist Plinius. From volcanic explosions and tidal waves to the ecology of plants and animals, the work reproduces the world of Natural History, the Plinius encyclopedia describing the universe. This is a definitive historical Roman romance depicting the world 2,000 years ago through astounding composition and realistic draftsmanship.

altTitles.ja: アトリ マイ ディア モーメンツ

description.en: “ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a popular novel game. This work, which boasts strong popularity both domestically and internationally, has been adapted into a comic by Jako with a transparent touch. In a calm town sinking into the sea, the “unforgettable summer” of a boy and a robot girl begins.”
description.vi:
Một phần của nền văn minh loài người đã bị nuốt chửng bởi sự dâng cao bất thường của mực nước biển, nguyên nhân vẫn chưa được làm sáng tỏ. Ikaruga Natsuki, cậu bé mồ côi mẹ và mất một chân trong tai nạn, trở về quê nhà sau nhiều năm sống khổ cực tại thành phố lớn. Tuy nhiên, khi về đến nơi, tất cả những gì cậu thấy chỉ là căn nhà cũ đã bị ngập dưới nước. Cậu không còn ai thân thuộc, chỉ có chiếc tàu và tàu ngầm do bà để lại, cùng với một khoản nợ lớn phải trả.

Cơ hội duy nhất để Natsuki lấy lại ước mơ về tương lai là nhận lời mời của Catherine - kẻ thu nợ đáng ngờ. Họ cùng nhau đi tìm kho báu trong phòng thí nghiệm dưới biển của bà Natsuki, nơi có tin đồn bà đã giấu một điều gì đó quý giá. Nhưng khi đến nơi, họ không tìm thấy tiền bạc hay đá quý, thay vào đó là một cô gái kỳ lạ đang ngủ say trong quan tài. Cô ấy tên là Atri.

Atri là một người máy, nhưng cô sở hữu vẻ ngoài và cảm xúc như một con người thật sự. Cô biết ơn Natsuki vì đã giải thoát mình khỏi quan tài, và nói với cậu:

"Em muốn hoàn thành ý nguyện cuối cùng của chủ nhân. Cho đến lúc đó, em sẽ là chân của anh!"

Trong thị trấn nhỏ dần chìm trong biển, một mùa hè đáng nhớ sắp diễn ra với cậu bé và cô gái người máy bí ẩn...

altTitles.ja: こぼれるアンビバレンス

description.en:
Wataru, a 3rd year student, has to do the cleaning at school in order to get enough credits to graduate. His partner in cleaning is Yugo, a 1st year student who tends to be absent at school. Yugo's arrogant attitude piques Wataru's interest since he sees in Yugo his childhood friend and, as a result, Wataru feels it's his duty to take care of him.
But Yugo hides a secret...

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

description.en:
A collection of short stories revolving around the relationships between Pokemon and characters from the THE iDOLM@STER franchise. 

Do note that the stories posted here are incomplete and are only taken from the artist's twitter (or X) account. 

If you want more Pokemon stories, be sure to buy his/her comics online, when it's available.

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: ためしにコマンド言ってみた

description.en:
“Masa, kneel.” Select shop owner Masa’s current crush is his best friend, Oto, a fashion model.
They’re both high-ranking doms who attract a lot of attention when they walk the streets. Oto has been feeling under the weather lately, since he was dumped by his sub partner… At the same time, Masa has been building good relationships with three partners.
Feeling that his commands are too forceful and scary, Oto asks Masa for advice, but then Oto jokingly commands Masa to kneel down…?!

title.en: S-kyuu Guild wo Tsuihousareta kedo, Jitsu wa Ore dake Dragon no Kotoba ga Wakaru no de, Kidzuita Toki ni wa Ryuu Kishi no Chouten wo Kiwametemashita

altTitles.ja: S級ギルドを追放されたけど、実は俺だけドラゴンの言葉がわかるので、気付いたときには竜騎士の頂点を極めてました。

altTitles.en: I've Been Kicked Out of an S-Rank Guild. But Only I Can Communicate With Dragons. Before I Knew It, I Became the Greatest Dragon Knight

description.en:
A super-class dragoon group-Cyril, a boy who was banished from the S-class guild "Lindworm" for some reason. What he had hidden was... the ability to "talk" with the dragons, which was unconventional!

Cyril who met unique dragons and launched his own guild. Perhaps because of its extraordinary qualities, the level of the guild soars at the fastest rate in history! Cyril, whose arm was recognized, will make a name for himself as a non-standard dragon knight.
description.ja:
超一流の竜騎士集団――Ｓ級ギルド『リントヴルム』からとある理由で追放された少年・シリル。彼が隠し持っていたのは……竜と“会話”ができるという、常識破りの能力だった！
ユニークな竜たちと出会い、自らのギルドを立ち上げたシリル。その驚異的な素質ゆえか、ギルドのレベルは史上最速の勢いで急上昇！　腕を認められたシリルは、規格外な竜騎士として名を馳せていく――！

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: ぎんたま
銀魂

description.en:
Sakata Gintoki is a samurai living in an era when samurai are no longer needed.  
  
To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens have moved in to invade. Gintoki lives with Kagura and Shinpachi, taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place… and to pay their rent.

[Official English*](https://www.viz.com/gin-tama)
***Viz Media quietly discontinued Gintama after Volume 23 of the manga (released in English in 2011). As of 2024, Viz has not made any additional comments on Gintama's publication.**
description.pl:
Kosmici zwani Amanto postanowili podbić kolejną planetę, a że padło na Ziemię… Cóż, zwykły pech. Wojna przyszła, poszła, a kosmici… Zostali, wpływając znacząco na rozwój technologiczny. W takim oto dziwnym świecie przyszło żyć Gintokiemu – chłopak najmuje się do każdej, nawet najczarniejszej roboty. Jeśli masz więc problem, nie zależnie od tego czy dotyczy on walki z pszczołami z innej planety, czy może zastępowania schorowanego personelu w barze transwestytów, zgłoś się do niego.  
Ayanami - 18 grudnia 2010
description.ru: Захватив Землю, пришельцы Аманто запретили ношение мечей, и единственный, в ком ещё жив подлинно японский дух — самоуверенный сластёна Гинтоки Саката. Неуклюжий очкарик Шинпачи нанялся к нему в ученики. Третьим в их команде стала прелестная Кагура из сильнейшего во Вселенной клана Ято, а с ней её питомец Садахару — пёсик размером с бегемота, обладающий забавной привычкой грызть головы всем, кто под морду подвернётся. Они называют себя «мастерами на все руки» и выполняют любые заказы — главное, чтобы заплатили…

altTitles.ja: 異世界勇者ミズキ

description.en:
A completely ordinary girl gets summoned into another world to become the hero.  
Hilarity ensues.  
  
Note: Is actually a 3-koma

Chapter 88 is the end of the original serialization, with the continuing chapters being released on the mangaka's Fanbox page (https://kimuramatsuri.fanbox.cc/posts).
description.id:
Seorang gadis yang benar - benar biasa saja dipanggil ke dunia lain untuk menjadi pahlawan.  
Kemeriahan pun terjadi.  
  
Note: Ini sebenernya 3-koma  
  
[Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/4890179)  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kmatsuri888)

title.en: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる

altTitles.en: The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsusaki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi
Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of This Scary Consignee Girl
The Story of a Scary Consignee
The Delivery Destination Onee-san Is Too Scary Story

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

title.en: The Supporting Girl Who Transmigrated Into the Book Only Wants to Be a Salted Fish

description.en: Cheng Yiqing was forced to be transformed into a vicious female supporting role in a book. The psychedelic character made her split in her daily life: - The heroine is such a hardworking and good girl, I feel so bad for hurting her! - The hero is a bastard! Qi Wenyao:? Since the day he heard Cheng Yiqing's inner voice, he has never had a good sleep! Damn woman, she is so hypocritical! She said she loved him, but she never stopped complaining in her heart! A vicious female supporting role who was reading the lines fell into deep thought: - I don't know if I will be struck by lightning if I lie every day? Qi Wenyao said indifferently: "I will just watch you act quietly!"

altTitles.ja: ドッペルさん

description.en: Unsociable girl vs. shady boy + doppelganger-san! Yamamoto and Hattori. The two can't start a romantic comedy on their own, but... Hattori's doppelganger, "Doppel-san," will tell him what she's really thinking! Is Doppel-san the cupid of love? Or is she just a figment of his imagination?
description.pt-br: Uma garota insociável x garoto sombrio + doppelgänger-san! Yamamoto e Hattori. Os dois não podem começar uma comédia romântica por conta própria, mas… O doppelganger de Hattori, “Doppel-san”, lhe dirá o que ela realmente está pensando! Doppel-san é o cupido do amor? Ou ele é apenas mais uma presença sinistra?

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Unrivaled Summoner Starts From Level 1: Destroy All the Reincarnated People in the Secret Dungeon That Only I Can Use

altTitles.pt-br: Invocador inigualável  começa no nível 1: Destrua todas os transmigradores na masmorra secreta que só eu posso usar

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder seu pai em um trágico acidente, Shinobu Iijima e sua irmã mais nova, Megumi, são acolhidos pelo velho amigo do seu pai, Ayumu.Shinobu trabalha duro na esperança de começar uma nova vida para si mesmo. Sua irmã Megumi e um jogo para celular chamado La Vita Online são as únicas coisas que o mantêm à tona.Um dia, Ayumu revela suas verdadeiras intenções de derrubar Shinobu e colocar as mãos em Megumi. Mas logo depois que Shinobu descobre que Ayumu excluiu todos os dados de seus jogos no La Vita, o apartamento deles no arranha-céu pega fogo e Shinobu cai para a morte, com Megumi a seu lado. Ele acorda em um mundo novo e estranho... e percebe que reencarnou no mundo do La Vita Online.Um anúncio dos desenvolvedores diz a ele que Ayumu já estão lá e que a contagem regressiva para a chegada de Megumi está correndo. Shinobu jura proteger Megumi depois que ela chegar a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique que ele tenha que rastejar desde o nível 1 para se defender de todos os outros transmigradores.

description.en:
Though Leon has years' worth of training in swordsmanship, it's still not enough to defeat his rival at the royal academy, Lionel. That is until one day, the holy sword Elsyd appears and names Leon as his chosen hero and new pupil. 

The young swordmaster didn't expect the holy sword's instruction to be easy, but now Elsyd is even trying to teach him how to... see? If Leon can manage to endure this, will he finally be strong enough to beat the privileged Lionel and earn his place in the world?
description.ko:
이것이 바로 정통 판타지다! 
뻔한 먼치킨물에 식상한 웹툰 독자들을 위한 성장형 용사물로 볼수록 가슴이 웅장해지는 감동을 안겨주는 작품. 

주인공 레온은 오직 노력과 근성으로 같은 왕립아카데미의 정점에 서있는 라이벌 리안을 넘어서고자 한다. 하지만 도저히 자신의 수련만으론 넘을 수 없는 벽이 있음을 실감하고 좌절하던 중, 리안에게 갈 운명이었던 성검 엘시드의 선택을 받게 된다. 레온의 올곧음에 반해 그를 용사 후보로 선택한 성검 엘시드에게 레온은 혹독한 수련을 받게 되고, 마침내 불가능할 것 같았던 리안과의 대결에서 승리를 거머쥐게 된다! 이제 성검의 주인 자격을 얻은 레온은 왕립아카데미를 떠나 세상을 구하는 영웅이 되기 위한 모험을 시작하는데…
description.pt-br: O protagonista de uma história é sempre decidido desde o início. Não importa o quanto o papel coadjuvante tente, eles serão apenas um papel coadjuvante no final. Então, chegou um momento em que tudo isso mudou. [Leon, você acha que é qualificado?] A espada sagrada que deveria escolher o herói do oráculo veio até ele. O que? Você não tem talento, pobre, e não tem conexões? Não se preocupe! O herói que pode resolver qualquer coisa com a espada sagrada está aqui! “… Houve um período em que eu pensei assim também. É aqui que começa a história de Leon como o herói.

title.en: I Can't Get Enough of You

altTitles.en: I Can’t Wait To Eat You

description.en: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."
description.fr:
Des capacités exceptionnelles. Une belle apparence qui ne passera pas inaperçue. Une famille aisée. Une vie sur un chemin bien tracé. Tout était ennuyeux et parfait. Jusqu'au jour où, à trente ans, Kim Tae-joon quitte impulsivement la route.
Rencontrer Han So-eun, la fille du chauffeur qui a coûté la vie à ses parents.
« Comment diable êtes-vous entré dans cette entreprise en tant qu'étranger ?
J'étais dégoûté par son impudeur, alors j'ai décidé de la garder et de la tourmenter. Comme quelqu'un qui n'en a jamais assez de toi....
"Je pense que j'aime le réalisateur."
Oh non.

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!
